name: Cilantro Mint Chutney
description: Super easy to make and delicious, this chutney recipe was slightly adapted from Amisha Dodhia Gurbaniâ€™s Mumbai Modern (Countryman Press, 2021). Enjoy at room temperature with grilled, fried, roasted foods, or anything that needs a bright contrasting flavor boost. Makes about 2/3 cup.
recipeIngredient: 1  serrano chile or 2 small green chiles ((remove seeds for less heat))

recipeInstructions.text: Put all the ingredients in a blender jar. Whirl into a smoothish mixture, pausing several times to scrape the sides or push ingredients down. Add up to 1 tablespoon water if the mixture is too thick for your liking.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a small bowl or jar. Use immediately, keep refrigerated for several days or freeze for up to 2 months.
